epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement secure user authentication and multi-factor authentication.
epics.description: Develop a secure user authentication process that includes multi-factor authentication to ensure only authorized users can access the portal. Security features should comply with industry standards and best practices to protect users' sensitive financial data.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a personalized dashboard for users.
epics.description: Design and develop a personalized dashboard that displays banking products and services based on the user's profile and eligibility. The dashboard should provide an intuitive and user-friendly interface that allows users to navigate and access information easily.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive and works across various devices.
epics.description: Implement a responsive design for the self-service portal to ensure it provides a consistent user experience across all devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. The portal should adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions seamlessly.

epics.title: Integrate with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Seamlessly integrate the portal with the bank's existing core banking system.
epics.description: Establish a robust integration with the bank's core banking system to ensure data consistency, real-time updates, and efficient processing. The integration should be designed to optimize performance and maintain the reliability of both systems.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Implement workflows for account opening and service modifications.
epics.description: Develop streamlined workflows that allow users to submit account opening requests and service modifications with minimal clicks. These workflows should be intuitive and require the least amount of effort from the user while ensuring all necessary information is captured efficiently.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide real-time status updates and email notifications for submitted requests.
epics.description: Implement a system for real-time status tracking of submitted requests. Users should receive email notifications on the status of their requests, ensuring they are always informed about the progress and any required actions.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions.
epics.description: Create a feature that logs and displays a comprehensive history of all user interactions within the portal. Users should be able to view past actions, submissions, and modifications, providing transparency and a record of their activities.

epics.title: Save and Resume Incomplete Applications
epics.summary: Allow users to save and resume incomplete applications.
epics.description: Develop the functionality that allows users to save their progress on incomplete applications and return to them at a later time. This feature should ensure that users can upload necessary documentation directly through the interface and continue from where they left off.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement role-based access controls based on user profiles.
epics.description: Establish role-based access controls to ensure that users can only view and access the services and information that are appropriate for their profile and authorization level. This will enhance security and personalization of the portal.

epics.title: Database Optimization for Performance
epics.summary: Optimize the portal's database for performance and reliability.
epics.description: Ensure optimal performance and high reliability of the self-service portal by maintaining its own database while seamlessly integrating with the bank's core banking system. Implement database optimization techniques such as indexing, caching, and load balancing to handle high volumes of user interactions efficiently.

epics.title: Documentation Upload Feature
epics.summary: Enable users to upload necessary documentation through the interface.
epics.description: Develop a functionality that allows users to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface while submitting account opening requests or service modifications. This feature should support various file formats and ensure secure storage of uploaded documents.
